title: All of a sudden Firefox losed and all of my tabs dissapeared when \I reolpened. The "Recently Closed Tabs" is grayed out
content:
bold textAll of a sudden Firefox closed and all of my tabs dissapeared when I reopened. The "Recently Closed Tabs" is grayed out

This happened once bnefore, but out of the blue the tabs were restored
creator: mstocker

title: "Block pop-up windows" blocks lastpass pages and popups Since last linux update 107.0.1
content: Lastpass vault and other lastpass popups do not display when "Block pop-up windows" is selected in settings. Firefox linux 107.0.1
creator: s.j.leath2
